comments: The coefficients of the partner polynomials are found in triangle A055858.
formula: a(n, m)=0 if n<m; a(n, m)= n^(m-1)*(n+1)^(n-m), n >= m >= 1;E.g.f. for column m: A(m, x); A(1, x)=-(W(-x)/x+1); recursion: A(m, x) = A(m-1, x)-int(A(m-1, x), x)/x-(((m-1)^(m-1))/m)* (x^(m-1))/(m-1)!, m >= 2; W(x) principal branch of Lambert's function.
mathematica: a[n_, m_] /; n < m = 0; a[n_, m_] := n^(m-1)*(n+1)^(n-m); Table[a[n, m], {n, 1, 8}, {m, 1, n}] // Flatten (* _Jean-FranÃ§ois Alcover_, Jun 20 2013 *)
author: _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jun 20 2000
